title: Ep. 68 - The Soldier's Scoundrel by Cat Sebastian (PART 1)
itunes:title: Ep. 68 - The Soldier's Scoundrel by Cat Sebastian (PART 1)
description:
Hey HB's! It's the next episode of maternity leave line up, featuring TANYA! Oh that's right, Tanya from A Knight in Shining Armor fame and glory. Don't worry, she says her piece here. 
 This week, we're covering part 1 of A Soldier's Scoundrel by Cat Sebastian. It's a queer romance featuring an injured veteran gentleman and a criminal-turned-fixer from the streets. Will they solve the case of the Lady's missing letters? And will they be able to suppress their own desires long enough to do so with their hearts uncompromised? 
 Bonus Content: A little about our friendship, the England Times gay scene, and the vehicle we're calling The Jeep of England Times. 
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
